meanings: (때·시기 등에 이르다) be, come, become; (나이가) reach, (formal) attain; (경과하다) pass
(동사적 명사에 붙어) become, get to be, be
a remark that does not work at all
a remark that does not work at all

meanings.meaning: chance would be a fine thing

examples.korean: If I may just add one thing… 발음듣기 제가 한 가지만 덧붙여도 된다면… Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: If I may just add one thing… 발음

examples.korean: If I might just say something… 발음듣기 제가 무슨 말씀을 드려도 된다면… Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: If I might just say something… 발음

examples.korean: How sad that all his hard work should come to nothing. 발음듣기 그의 모든 노고가 허사가 된다면 얼마나 슬픈 일인가. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: How sad that all his hard work should come to nothing. 발음

examples.korean: If I can afford it, I think I’ll go private. 발음듣기 나는 형편만 된다면 (국가 의료 보험에 의한 진료가 아닌) 개인 진료를 받겠다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: If I can afford it, I think I’ll go private. 발음

examples.korean: I’d love a ride home—if it’s not out of your way. 발음듣기 집에까지 태워다 주시면 고맙겠어요. (당신이 가시는 방향에서) 길을 많이 돌아가시지 않아도 된다면요. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I’d love a ride home—if it’s not out of your way. 발음
